features: BLISSFUL NIGHTS: Our pillow's ergonomic design is meticulously engineered to support sleepers, ensuring a fit that matches your sleep posture and promotes restful, uninterrupted nights.
PRO-DESIGN: Exclusively crafted to support the three primary human sleep positions, showcasing a dedication unmatched in pillow design.
EASY-CARE PILLOWCASE: Our pillow features a removable and washable pillowcase, custom-made to fit its unique design.
ODDOR FREE: You can be sure that the memory foam we use is non-toxic CertiPUR-US qualified and after the normal short period of ventilation is going to be 100% oddor free.

DIMENSIONS: With its adaptable height and gentle rebound, this pillow effortlessly conforms to your unique sleeping style. Size: 24" x 15" x 4.72" - 3.15". Core: 100% Polyurethane. Cover: 65% Polyester, 35% Spandex.
BLISSFUL BODY: As a single-product brand, our expertise is in understanding and designing the ideal ergonomic pillow that truly delivers dreams.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Like a cloud! The more I used it, the more the pillow adjusted to my body with great support and comfort. I also love that you can machine wash the cover to keep it clean and fresh. Definitely a must if you experience neck and shoulder pain while sleeping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I do get a better night’s sleep!
reviews.reviewText: The BLISSFUL BODY® Side Sleeper Pillow impressed me with its dual pillow heights, catering to an alternate comfort preferences. The removable cover is a practical touch for easy maintenance. Although the odd shape limits pillowcase options, I found a workaround by wearing a bonnet during sleep, making it a small trade-off for a personalized sleeping experience. I do like the notches where your arms can rest and the fact that the lifted area on one side prevents me from sleeping with half my face mashed down into the pillow. Less morning swelling in the eye area is a plus!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Awkward Shape For Sleeping
reviews.reviewText: I will say the memory foam is really great on this pillow! It’s a very good quality foam, giving in to the weight of the head just enough with a super comfortable feel.But I don’t find the odd shape of the pillow to be comfortable for using beneath my head as demonstrated. If I lay on the pillow like the woman in the ad, I find there is not enough height up from the mattress. There is also a kind of awkward space between my lower neck and shoulders… as though I need a little more pillow to extend to at least the top edges of my shoulders. Because of the weird shape, there are no other good ways to sleep with my head on it.I do find if I prop one side of it length wise against my back, it is great support while using one of my other pretty good pillows for my head.I would’ve loved this pillow in a more standard pillow shape!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like a charm… 1000 times better than my old one
reviews.reviewText: Really comfortable any way that I sleep on it. Superb quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, but not a perfect design
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my boyfriend who is mostly a side sleeper, but also sleeps on his back some, so I thought a versatile pillow like this could be helpful. He seems to find the design a bit confusing, but overall he likes the pillow. We did notice a bit of that new memory foam smell at first, but it went away fairly quickly. Additionally, it firmed up and expanded fairly quickly too within a handful of hours after removing it from the packaging, and provides pretty good neck support. However, it's not as comfortable for sleeping on your back as the listing makes it seem. I feel like on the side it's okay, but seems to high/tall for back sleepers, so I don't think it's as versatile as it seems. The flap things on the side are a bit odd and go unused by my household. It does seem to stay pretty cool and not overheat you. Overall we like this pillow and it's comfortable for side sleeping, but the design isn't perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works to help stop my snoring - works for side and back sleepers
reviews.reviewText: I really like this pillow. It's not as firm as some of the memory foam contoured pillows out there but it's firm enough to support my head and neck well. Wife reports much less snoring from me - more of that even deep breathing. I don't wake up with sore shoulders anymore either. I sleep both on my back and my side, and it works equally well. You can even turn the pillow around and use either side for support. Solid bet if you're a snoring side and back sleeper!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better for back sleeper than side sleeper
reviews.reviewText: This is a good quality, comfy pillow, but really depends how you like to sleep. I thought this would be good for side sleeping but the spots for your arms aren’t really that useful. But great head/neck support if you sleep on your back.
